Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of light-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric is relatively coarse and contains various inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393401) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393401)
